info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 2:04PM EDT until July 17 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN BELMONT...NORTH CENTRAL WETZEL AND MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 204 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Powhatan Point, or 7 miles southwest of Moundsville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Moundsville, Powhatan Point, Cameron, Clarington, Lynn Camp, Glen Easton, Grove Oak, and Woodlands. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
